key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to rising material costs and delays
Economic sensitivity tied to housing market and consumer spending
Geopolitical risks from U.S.-China trade tensions and regulatory changes
Regulatory compliance challenges in a highly regulated industry
Intense competitive pressures in water heating and treatment markets
Legal and financial concerns including shareholder investigations and labor disputes
controversies: Shareholder investigation related to undisclosed relationships in China
Stock price drop following weak financial performance
Labor disputes with Smith Steel Workers Union
environmental_issues: Need to comply with stringent environmental standards
social_issues: Labor disputes and potential workforce management challenges
